defs: = ಮುಂಜಗಲಿ.
to move or go slightly forward.
care taken beforehand; caution used in advance; precaution.
a measure taken beforehand against possible danger, failure, etc.; precaution.
the early morning (before the sunrise).
(gen.) the morning ( running upto 8 a.m.).
in the early morning.
a gridle made of this for a brāhmaṇa boy.

a religious function, held just before sending a male brāhmaṇa student to the residence of his teacher for learning, in which he is initiated with the hymn of light (the Gāyatri hymn) by his father and invested with the sacred thread; (now that religious function only).

to perform the religious function, held just before sending a male brāhmaṇa student to the residence of the teacher for learning, and initiate him with the hymn of light (the Gāyatri hymn) and invest with the sacred thread.
= ಮುಂಜಿಗಟ್ಟಿಸು.
a lock of hair on the forehead; the forelock.
the projecting edge of the roof of a house; eaves.

that portion of a sari (sīre, a garment worn by Indian women, consisting of a long piece of cotton or silk wrapped around the body with one end draped over the head or over one shoulder) or dhoti (a loose, unstitched. oblong cloth used by men to cover from waist to feet), which forms the front potion when worn.
= ಮುಂಜೆರಗು.
= ಮುಂಜೆರಗು.

the central part of a sari (sīre, a garment worn by Indian women, consisting of a long piece of cotton or silk wrapped around the body with one end draped over the head or over one shoulder) excluding the borders on all sides, which can be stretched out to hold something.
a bending or stooping forward.
the quality of being unsteady, unstable.

a long loincloth covering upto the knees worn by men; a narrow dhoti.
an oblong, unstiched cloth, used as a headgear.
head-shaven.
pruned; cut; ( said of leaves, twigs, etc.).
not having horns or antlers.
not sharp; not keen; blunt; (said of the blade of a cutting weapon).
of the lowest quality, degree, value, etc.; base; despicable; mean.
a man having no hair on the scalp.
a man with his head shaven.
a tree the branches of which are cut off.
a blunt weapon.
the forehead (of a human being).
a man whose occupation is cutting hair, shaving and trimming beards etc.; a barber.
the head.
a headless body of a human being.
a man having a mutilated limb or limbs.
a plant which exudes a fragrant, bitter-tasting gum resin used in making incense, perfume, etc.
the plant Merremia emarginata ( = Ipomoea reniformis) of Convolvulaceae family (?).
(myth.) the serpent demon Rāhu, who is believed to eclipse the sun and moon.
iron.
the height of a normal man taken as a unit of measurement of height or depth.
a metal block on which goldsmiths shape gold or silver articles; an anvil.
a solid figure consisting of the bottom part of a cone or pyramid, the top of which has been cut off by a plane parallel to the base; a frustum.

name of one of the principal Upanishads.

name of one of the principal Upanishads.

its grain, used in making malt, soups, etc.; barley.

iron.

iron.
a language of the Dravidian family.
a man who speaks this language as his mother-tongue.
the community of such people, as a whole.
a fondling, caressing with affection.
to fondle, caress with affection.
to kiss to express one's affection, love.
to touch with one's palm another gently as a mark of caressing.
a standing on one's head; a being upside down.
any of various styles of headdress worn by men consisting of a length of cloth wound in folds about the head; a turban.

that which is bald or shaven.
